entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who rummaged in his trunk and pulled out the miniature figure of Viktor Krum. He is also mentioned as having a conversation with Neville.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as looking at the miniature figure of Viktor Krum enviously.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as a miniature figure that Ron pulled out of his trunk.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as appearing in the doorway and pointing at Pigwidgeon's cage.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is mentioned as being in a cage with Ron's dress robes sleeve dangling from it.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as standing behind Draco Malfoy and appearing to have grown at least a foot during the summer.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as standing behind Draco Malfoy and appearing to have grown at least a foot during the summer.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as saying 'Don't remember asking you to join us, Malfoy'.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as leaving the compartment door ajar.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as leaving the compartment door ajar.

relationships.description: Ron has the miniature figure of Viktor Krum.
Neville admires the miniature figure of Viktor Krum.
Draco Malfoy points at Pigwidgeon's cage.
